scripts.generate: pnpm run transpile && pnpm run generate:tailwindcss && pnpm run prepare:css && pnpm run generate:order-lists
scripts.generate:order-lists: git rev-parse --show-toplevel | ( read rootpath; cd $rootpath/_nodejs_ && node ./dist/generate-order-list.js --src ./style.css --stylelintrc ./dist/stylelint.config.js --out $rootpath/dist/order_list.json )
scripts.generate:tailwindcss: git rev-parse --show-toplevel | ( read rootpath; cd $rootpath/_nodejs_ && pnpm dlx @tailwindcss/cli@4.1.* -i ./tailwind.css -o ./style-raw.css )
scripts.prepare:css: git rev-parse --show-toplevel | ( read rootpath; cd $rootpath/_nodejs_ && node ./dist/prepare-css.js --in ./style-raw.css --out ./style.css )
scripts.transpile: git rev-parse --show-toplevel | ( read rootpath; cd $rootpath/_nodejs_ && tsc --target esnext --outdir ./dist )
